mapper.sql: VENUES_ID as venuesId , VENUES_NAME as venuesName, RELIGIOUS_SECT as religiousSect, REGISTER_NBR as registerNbr, VENUES_PHONE as venuesPhone, ORGANIZATION as organization, VENUES_ADDRES as venuesAddres, PICTURES_PATH as picturesPath, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON as responsiblePerson, LIAISON_MAN as liaisonMan, BRIEF_INTRODUCTION as briefIntroduction, VENUES_STATUS as venuesStatus, CREATOR as creator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, LAST_MODIFIER as lastModifier, LAST_MODIFY_TIME as lastModifyTime, LONGITUDE as longitude, LATITUDE as Latitude, LATITUDE as latitudes, GROUP_MEMBERS as groupMembers, PROVINCE as province, CITY as city, AREA as area, TOWN as town, VENUES_STAFF as venuesStaff

VENUES_ID as venuesId , VENUES_NAME as venuesName, rm_venues_info.RELIGIOUS_SECT as religiousSect, REGISTER_NBR as registerNbr, VENUES_PHONE as venuesPhone, ORGANIZATION as organization, VENUES_ADDRES as venuesAddres, PICTURES_ONE as picturesOne, PICTURES_TWO as picturesTwo, PICTURES_THREE as picturesThree, rm_venues_info.RESPONSIBLE_PERSON as responsiblePerson, LIAISON_MAN as liaisonMan, BRIEF_INTRODUCTION as briefIntroduction, VENUES_STATUS as venuesStatus, rm_staff_info.STAFF_CD as staffCd, STAFF_CN_NM as staffName, CERT_TYPE_CD as certTypeCd, CERT_NBR as certNbr, STAFF_PICTURE as staffPicture, STAFF_TELPHONE as staffTelphone, STAFF_STATUS as staffStatus, STAFF_POST as staffPost,
mapper.select: SELECT FROM rm_venues_info INNER JOIN rm_staff_info ON rm_staff_info.STAFF_CD=rm_venues_info.RESPONSIBLE_PERSON
mapper.insert: insert into RM_VENUES_INFO( VENUES_NAME, RELIGIOUS_SECT, REGISTER_NBR, VENUES_PHONE, ORGANIZATION, VENUES_ADDRES, PICTURES_PATH, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON, LIAISON_MAN, BRIEF_INTRODUCTION, VENUES_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, LAST_MODIFIER, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, TOWN, VENUES_STAFF, GROUP_MEMBERS )values ( #{venuesName}, #{religiousSect}, #{registerNbr}, #{venuesPhone}, #{organization}, #{venuesAddres}, #{picturesPath}, #{responsiblePerson}, #{liaisonMan}, #{briefIntroduction}, #{venuesStatus}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{longitude}, #{Latitude}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{town}, #{venuesStaff}, #{groupMembers} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RM_VENUES_INFO set VENUES_NAME =#{venuesName}, RELIGIOUS_SECT =#{religiousSect}, REGISTER_NBR =#{registerNbr}, VENUES_PHONE =#{venuesPhone}, ORGANIZATION =#{organization}, VENUES_ADDRES =#{venuesAddres}, PICTURES_PATH =#{picturesPath}, RESPONSIBLE_PERSON =#{responsiblePerson}, LIAISON_MAN =#{liaisonMan}, BRIEF_INTRODUCTION =#{briefIntroduction}, LAST_MODIFIER =#{lastModifier}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME =#{lastModifyTime}, LONGITUDE =#{longitude}, LATITUDE =#{Latitude}, GROUP_MEMBERS =#{groupMembers}, PROVINCE =#{province}, CITY =#{city}, AREA =#{area}, TOWN =#{ town}, VENUES_STAFF =#{venuesStaff} WHERE VENUES_ID = #{venuesId}

UPDATE RM_VENUES_INFO set PICTURES_PATH=#{picturesPath}, VENUES_PHONE=#{venuesPhone}, BRIEF_INTRODUCTION=#{briefIntroduction}, LAST_MODIFIER=#{lastModifier}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME= #{lastModifyTime} WHERE VENUES_ID = #{venuesId}
update RM_VENUES_INFO set VENUES_STATUS='02' where VENUES_ID = #{venuesId}
mapper.select: select * from RM_VENUES_INFO where RESPONSIBLE_PERSON=#{responsiblePerson}

select ve.VENUES_ID as venuesId , ve.VENUES_NAME as venuesName, ve.RELIGIOUS_SECT as religiousSect, ve.REGISTER_NBR as registerNbr, ve.VENUES_PHONE as venuesPhone, ve.ORGANIZATION as organization, ve.VENUES_ADDRES as venuesAddres, ve.PICTURES_PATH as picturesPath, ve.BRIEF_INTRODUCTION as briefIntroduction, ve.LONGITUDE as longitude, ve.latitude as Latitude, ve.RESPONSIBLE_PERSON as resId, res.MANAGER_CN_NM as resNm, res.MANAGER_MOBILE as resMo, ve.LIAISON_MAN as liaId, lia.MANAGER_CN_NM as liaNm, lia.MANAGER_MOBILE as liaMo, ve.GROUP_MEMBERS as groId, gro.MANAGER_CN_NM as groNm, gro.MANAGER_MOBILE as groMo, ve.PROVINCE as province, ve.CITY as city, ve.AREA as area, ve.TOWN as town, ve.VENUES_STAFF as venuesStaff from RM_VENUES_INFO ve left join rm_venues_manager_info res on res.MANAGER_ID=ve.RESPONSIBLE_PERSON and res.MANAGER_TYPE_CD='01' left join rm_venues_manager_info gro on gro.MANAGER_ID=ve.GROUP_MEMBERS and gro.MANAGER_TYPE_CD='02' left join rm_venues_manager_info lia on lia.MANAGER_ID=ve.LIAISON_MAN and lia.MANAGER_TYPE_CD='03' where VENUES_ID=#{venuesId}

SELECT TASK_NAME as filingNm FROM rm_filing_info where FILING_STATUS='02'
and REL_VENUES_ID = #{relVenuesId}

SELECT IDENTITY as type, USER_NM as name, USER_MOBILE as phone, IDENTITY as identity FROM rm_sys_user_info where VALID_IND='1' and IDENTITY in ('10000007','10000006')
and REL_VENUES_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{relVenuesId},'%')

select s.STAFF_ID as id, s.STAFF_CN_NM as name, s.STAFF_TELPHONE as phone from rm_staff_info s where 1=1
and REL_VENUES_ID = #{relVenuesId}

select s.STAFF_ID as id, s.STAFF_CN_NM as name, s.STAFF_TELPHONE as phone from rm_staff_info s where s.STAFF_ID in
#{item}

select VENUES_ID as venuesId from RM_VENUES_INFO where VENUES_STATUS!='02'
and VENUES_NAME = #{venuesName}

select ve.VENUES_ID as venuesId , ve.VENUES_NAME as venuesName, ve.REGISTER_NBR as registerNbr, ve.PICTURES_PATH as picturesPath, ve.VENUES_PHONE as venuesPhone, ve.ORGANIZATION as organization, ve.VENUES_ADDRES as venuesAddres, ve.BRIEF_INTRODUCTION as briefIntroduction, ve.RELIGIOUS_SECT as religiousSect, d.DICT_CN_DESC as religiousSectCn, m.MANAGER_CN_NM as managerCnNm, m.MANAGER_MOBILE as managerMobile from RM_VENUES_INFO ve left join RM_SYS_DICT d on ve.RELIGIOUS_SECT=d.DICT_CD left join rm_venues_manager_info m on ve.RESPONSIBLE_PERSON=m.MANAGER_ID where m.MANAGER_MOBILE=#{login}
and ( RESPONSIBLE_PERSON LIKE concat('%',#{search},'%') or VENUES_ADDRES LIKE concat('%',#{search},'%') or VENUES_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{search},'%'))
select GROUP_CONCAT(distinct s.STAFF_CN_NM) as names from rm_staff_info s where REL_VENUES_ID = #{relVenuesId}
SELECT v.VENUES_NAME as venuesName, FLOOR(rand()*100) as score FROM RM_VENUES_INFO v order by score desc limit 0,#{num}
select v.VENUES_ID as venuesId,CONCAT('瓯海区 ',t.TOWN_NAME) as organization from RM_VENUES_INFO v left join rm_town_info t on v.TOWN=t.TOWN_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE RM_VENUES_INFO set ORGANIZATION=#{organization} WHERE VENUES_ID = #{venuesId}
